scripts.watch: watchexec --project-origin . -c -w helpers -w packages/rescript-mui-material -w packages/rescript-mui-lab -w packages/rescript-mui-x-date-pickers -w examples -i lib -e res,resi 'rescript build -with-deps'
scripts.generateOverrides: node helpers/src/GenerateOverrides.bs.js && rescript format ./packages/rescript-mui-material/src/types/Overrides.res && rescript format ./packages/rescript-mui-lab/src/Overrides.res
